values: Creating bronze through ancient metallurgical alloying. Harder than copper, more workable than iron. Rarely produces exceptional quality ingots.
Forging steel from carbon-rich ore. Requires intense heat.
Forging steel with frost essence. The metal is cold to touch, always.
Infusing copper with storm essence. Perfect magical conductivity.
Infusing steel with fire essence. The metal burns without being consumed.
Milling ash into planks. Superior shock absorption.
Milling maple wood. Resists warping beautifully.
Processing birch into fine planks. Excellent for detail work.
Processing ebony. The wood absorbs light as you work.
Processing pine into planks. Light, flexible wood.
Refining common copper into uncommon quality. Careful heat and patience.
Refining common iron into uncommon quality. Patient work and precise heat.
Refining epic adamantine into legendary quality. Hardness beyond measurement.
Refining epic copper into legendary quality. Perfect molecular alignment achieved.
Refining epic iron into legendary quality. Transcending conventional limits.
Refining epic mithril into legendary quality. The impossible made real.
Refining epic orichalcum into legendary quality. Ancient metal awakens fully.
Refining epic steel into legendary quality. Perfection crystallized in metal.
Refining legendary etherion into mythical quality. Temporal boundaries dissolve entirely.
Refining legendary mithril into mythical quality. The metal sings in harmonic perfection.
Refining legendary mithril. The metal seems to purify itself, occasionally yielding higher quality ingots.
Refining legendary orichalcum into mythical quality. The ancient metal awakens completely.
Refining metal that exists in multiple states. Reality bends during the process.
Refining rare adamantine into epic quality. Nearly indestructible becomes truly eternal.
Refining rare bronze into epic quality. Surpassing even the legendary smiths of old.
Refining rare copper into epic quality. Approaching theoretical perfection.
Refining rare iron into epic quality. Metal that defies conventional limits.
Refining rare mithril into epic quality. The metal sings as it transforms.
Refining rare steel into epic quality. Months of dedication distilled into perfection.
Refining rare tin into epic quality. Perfect magical conductivity achieved.
Refining the ancient metal. Channels both physical and magical forces.
Refining tin ore into silvery metal. Essential for alloys.
Refining uncommon bronze into rare quality. The ancient alloy perfected.
Refining uncommon copper into rare quality. The grain becomes perfect.
Refining uncommon iron into rare quality. Crystalline structure perfecting.
Refining uncommon steel into rare quality. Perfect crystalline structure.
Refining uncommon tin into rare quality. Silvery sheen becomes mirror-bright.
Sawing ironwood requires special blades. Wood dulls them quickly.
Sawing oak logs into usable planks. Basic carpentry.
Smelting adamantine requires extreme heat and purification techniques. Sometimes yields exceptionally pure ingots.
Smelting iron ore into reliable metal. Backbone of civilization. Crushing the ore first increases yield.
Smelting raw copper into usable ingots. The foundation of metallurgy.
Working worldtree wood. It remembers being part of something greater.
Air crystal creates speed foundation. Lightning shard adds electric quickness. Spectral thread binds temporal acceleration. Move like lightning.
Air crystals create fluid motion essence. Spectral thread lightens body, quickens reflexes. Slime gel binds to living form. World seems to slow.
Air crystals deny gravity. Spectral thread lightens physical form. Void essence completes separation from earth. Living ichor binds to body. You float.
Automated collector - iron houses mechanism, light gem identifies targets, spectral thread extends reach, slime gel provides adhesive grip. Saves countless trips.
Basic arrow turret - iron frame for stability, oak mechanism for firing, beetle carapace provides spring tension. Point away from face.
Bear trap - steel forms jaw mechanism, dire fangs form serrated edges. Once closed, nothing escapes. Perfect spring tension required.
Cluster bomb - steel casing fragments, blast powder creates multiple charges, air crystals ensure wide dispersal. Maximum coverage.
Copper dissolves first into base form. Fire crystal catalyzes transformation to tin. Foundation of alchemical wealth.
Crystal quartz creates magical base, pure potential. Light gems infuse arcane energy. Water crystals stabilize volatile magic into drinkable form. Mana floods back.
Dire fangs dissolve first, releasing strength essence. Fire crystals amplify power. Beetle carapace adds durability to effect. Too early blocks absorption, too late makes it brief.
Dire fangs release primal fury. Fire crystals ignite rage. Storm heart adds raw power. Living ichor binds controlled chaos. Unleash inner beast.
Dire fangs release venom. Shadow core amplifies toxicity. Slime gel stabilizes for storage. Coat weapons with deadly brew.
EMP device - orichalcum frame channels energy, lightning shards provide pulse, storm heart amplifies. Technology's nightmare.
Essence blood provides foundation. Light gem illuminates and purifies. Living ichor amplifies. Miss a peak, lose potency - catch them all, wounds close rapidly.
Fire arrow turret - steel frame withstands heat, birch mechanism fires, fire crystals ignite projectiles. Warm touch to home defense.
Fire bomb - steel casing survives blast, blast powder creates explosion, fire crystals add burning. Melts stone.
Fire crystals generate inner warmth. Phoenix ash adds perpetual heat never fading. Slime gel spreads throughout body. Cold cannot touch you.
Fire then water - must balance before adding earth. Air completes cycle. Balance in bottle - all elements recognize you as kin.
Flamethrower turret - steel frame withstands heat, fire crystals fuel inferno, phoenix ash ensures perpetual burn. Excellent crowd control.
Frost mine - iron casing protects mechanism, blast powder triggers, frost essence provides freezing blast. Bury and wait.

Gold base for perfection. Dragon scale adds ancient power. Essence blood provides life. Void essence enables transmutation. Phoenix ash grants rebirth. Storm heart completes opus. Magnum achievement of alchemy.
Golem core provides titan strength. Storm heart adds raw power. Phoenix ash ensures perpetual effect. Essence blood binds all. You feel unstoppable.
Grappling hook - iron forms hook, spectral thread creates unbreakable line, air crystals enable vertical mobility. Hooks distant surfaces.
Healing beacon - steel frame supports, light gems project aura, living ichor provides life force, water crystals extend radius. Continuous healing.
Iron dissolves to potential. Coal provides carbon. Fire crystal bonds them into steel. Alchemy surpasses forging.
Iron scales dissolve into liquid stone base. Earth crystal adds flexible protection. Golem core solidifies without rigidity. Skin hardens like metal.
Jetpack for brief flight - mithril frame lightweight, fire crystals provide thrust, air crystals stabilize, phoenix ash ensures sustained burn. Fuel not included.
Laser turret - mithril frame reflects energy, light gems provide power, crystal quartz lenses focus to cutting intensity. Precise and devastating.
Light gems infuse eyes with illumination. Shadow core teaches seeing through darkness. Living ichor carries to vision. Darkness becomes irrelevant.
Lightning cannon - mithril frame conducts perfectly, ironwood mechanism directs, lightning shards provide power, storm heart amplifies. Extremely effective, extremely dangerous.
Limestone dissolves, creating crystalline matrix. Phoenix ash ignites transformation. Chaos becomes order - heat solidifies into stable crystal.
Limestone grinds to powder. Light gem infuses protective shimmer. Slime gel binds into paste. Sheen turns blades.
Living ichor creates sustained healing potential. Light gems infuse persistent illumination. Essence blood binds regenerative effect. Body remembers how to heal continuously.
Living ichor provides life force base. Water crystals amplify properties. Slime gel completes stabilization. Each stage must settle before next.
Living ichor provides raw life force. Light gems purify and concentrate. Pure essence emerges - no impurities, pure vitality.
Living ichor purges toxins from blood. Light gem illuminates and neutralizes poison. Simple but effective - corruption burns away.
Net launcher - iron frame launches, spectral thread forms unbreakable net, beetle carapace weights edges. Reduces movement dramatically.
Poison gas trap - iron casing contains, slime gel creates gas, shadow cores amplify toxicity. Choking clouds on trigger.
Proximity alarm - iron housing protects, light gem detects movement, beetle carapace creates sound. Simple but effective early warning.
Repair drone - mithril frame enables flight, light gem powers systems, spectral thread manipulates tools, living ichor enables restoration. Fixes what breaks.
Scanner detecting resources - steel houses sensors, light gems power scanning, crystal quartz focuses detection, air crystals enable remote sensing. Knowledge is power.
Shadow cores create concealment base. Spectral thread bends light around you. Void essence completes erasure. Living ichor binds to living form. You become absence.
Shield generator creating barrier - steel supports projectors, light gems power field, crystal quartz shapes barrier, water crystals distribute energy. Damage breaks on barrier.
Simple explosive - iron casing contains, blast powder explodes. Universal problem solver.
Slime gel creates base. Fire crystal adds warming confidence. Simple but effective - fear melts away.
Slime gel creates slick base. Spectral thread adds supernatural efficiency. Water crystal prevents evaporation. Productivity soars.
Slime gel dissolves first, creating restorative base. Wolf pelt binds mixture second. Watch for gentle green glow - too quick and they won't merge.
Slow field generator - iron anchors reality, frost essence creates temporal drag, crystal projects field, water stabilizes. Everything moves through frozen honey.
Spike trap - iron base forms platform, steel spikes deliver damage, beetle carapace provides snap force. Simple but brutal.
Storm heart provides raw lightning. Crystal quartz captures and stabilizes. Electricity crystallizes into solid form.
Teleporter folding space - etherion anchors reality, chaos matrix enables impossible, void essence tears dimensions, genesis lattice stabilizes. Science or magic? Yes.
Void bomb creating spatial tears - adamantine contains impossible, void essence tears reality, blast powder triggers, voidstone amplifies. Do not use indoors.
Void essence unmakes matter. Shadow cores channel dissolution. Voidstone stabilizes impossible. Miss timing, dissolves cauldron itself.
Water crystals attune body to aquatic existence. Air crystals teach lungs extracting oxygen from water. Living ichor completes transformation. Breathe liquid as air.
Water crystals create cooling base. Frost essence adds cold countering flame. Slime gel binds protection to skin. Fire cannot touch you.

metadata.narrative: Refining legendary mithril into mythical quality. The metal sings in harmonic perfection.

_usable_template.narrative: Air crystal creates speed foundation. Lightning shard adds electric quickness. Spectral thread binds temporal acceleration. Move like lightning.

metadata.narrative: Smelting raw copper into usable ingots. The foundation of metallurgy.
Smelting iron ore into reliable metal. Backbone of civilization. Crushing the ore first increases yield.
Refining tin ore into silvery metal. Essential for alloys.
Forging steel from carbon-rich ore. Requires intense heat.
Refining legendary mithril. The metal seems to purify itself, occasionally yielding higher quality ingots.
